description: From Middle English helthful, helþful, helþeful, equivalent to health +‎ -ful.

adjectives.description: healthful (comparative healthfuller or more healthful, superlative healthfullest or most healthful)

examples: Hockey is an exciting and healthful form of exercise, well suited to college students  […]

entries.meaning: Conducive to moral or spiritual prosperity; salutary.
examples: As he had been thinking for months about leaving his wife and had not done it because it would be too cruel to deprive her of himself, her departure was a very healthful shock.
